textAfterTable: delivery price 1. standard delivery within 3-5 working days £3.95 free on orders £50 and over 2. named day delivery choose a day, monday to friday (excluding public holidays) when you order by 10pm weekdays £6.95 3. express before 1pm next working day before 1pm, when you order by 10pm (2pm on Sunday) £7.95 4. saturday delivery delivery on the following Saturday when you order by 10pm Friday £6.95 5. sunday delivery sorry, this service is currently unavailable   6. monday delivery order by 2pm on Sunday (this option is only available at the weekend) £6.95 1. standard delivery Standard Delivery is available Monday to Saturday, excluding public holidays. 2. named day delivery You can choose your preferred delivery day Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays) up to 5 days in advance if you order by 10pm the day before. (If you require Monday delivery for an order you place over the weekend, please use our Monday delivery service) We cannot offer named day delivery to the Scottish Highlands & Islands, Northern Ireland and other postcodes outside mainland Britain. Please see here for affected postcodes. 3. express delivery before 1pm We can deliver
